tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    traffic_level INT,
    congestion_status VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Lights (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    signal_status VARCHAR(50),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Cameras (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    camera_type VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(50),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_name VARCHAR(255),
    traffic_volume INT,
    average_speed INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Incidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
